description: Application error logs across all services. Runtime exceptions, service failures, and critical application errors. Essential for incident response and service reliability monitoring.
Kubernetes Out of Memory (OOM) events across all containers. Memory limit exceeded, container kills, and resource exhaustion. Critical for capacity planning and resource optimization.
Nginx 5xx server error responses across all URL paths. Backend failures, proxy errors, and service unavailability. Critical for API reliability and user experience monitoring.
Application exception logs across all services. Unhandled exceptions, stack traces, and runtime errors. Essential for debugging and application stability monitoring.
Kubernetes container restart events across all containers. Pod restarts, crash loops, and recovery events. Critical for service stability and cluster health monitoring.
Database timeout events across all services. Query timeouts, connection timeouts, and slow queries. Essential for database performance monitoring and optimization.
Security authentication failures for all users. Failed login attempts, authorization errors, and security violations. Critical for security monitoring and threat detection.
Jenkins build failures across all services. CI/CD pipeline failures, deployment errors, and build system issues. Essential for DevOps pipeline monitoring and deployment reliability.
AWS service throttling events across all cloud services. API rate limiting, quota exceeded, and service capacity issues. Critical for cloud resource monitoring and cost optimization.
Kubernetes pod pending events across all pods. Resource constraints, scheduling failures, and cluster capacity issues. Essential for cluster resource management and scaling decisions.
Prometheus service down alerts across all services. Service unavailability, health check failures, and monitoring target outages. Critical for SRE alerting and incident response.
Application performance degradation logs across all services. Slow response times, performance warnings, and latency issues. Essential for SLA monitoring and performance optimization.
Istio service mesh 503 errors for all destination services. Circuit breaker activation, service unavailability, and mesh connectivity issues. Critical for microservices reliability monitoring.
Docker image pull events for all container images. Image registry access, deployment preparation, and container startup. Important for deployment monitoring and registry health.
Kafka consumer lag events across all datasets. Message processing delays, consumer performance issues, and streaming pipeline health. Essential for real-time data processing monitoring.
Application memory-related logs across all services. Memory leaks, garbage collection issues, and heap space problems. Critical for application performance tuning and resource planning.
Network connection events from all source IPs. Connection failures, network timeouts, and connectivity issues. Critical for network troubleshooting and security monitoring.
Deployment rollback events across all services. Failed deployments, version reversions, and release management. Essential for DevOps deployment pipeline monitoring and change management.
Kubernetes pod eviction events across all pods. Resource pressure, node capacity issues, and cluster resource management. Critical for cluster stability and resource optimization.
Elasticsearch cluster events across all clusters. Cluster health changes, node failures, and index management. Essential for search platform monitoring and data availability.
HashiCorp Vault seal/unseal events across all services. Vault availability, secret access interruptions, and security state changes. Critical for secrets management and security compliance.
Application deadlock events across all services. Thread deadlocks, resource contention, and concurrency issues. Essential for application stability and performance debugging.
Monitoring system alerts across all services. Threshold breaches, anomaly detection, and automated alerts. Critical for SRE proactive monitoring and incident prevention.

Terraform infrastructure deployment failures across all services. Resource provisioning errors, state management issues, and infrastructure automation problems. Essential for infrastructure-as-code monitoring.
Application cache-related events across all services. Cache misses, evictions, and performance issues. Important for application performance optimization and caching strategy evaluation.
Kubernetes node events across all nodes. Node failures, resource pressure, and cluster infrastructure issues. Critical for cluster health monitoring and capacity planning.
CI/CD deployment events across all services. Deployment starts, completions, and status updates. Essential for DevOps pipeline monitoring and release tracking.
Application startup events across all services. Service initialization, bootstrap processes, and startup failures. Important for deployment monitoring and service health tracking.
Load balancer health check events across all services. Health check failures, target registration, and load balancing decisions. Critical for traffic routing and service availability.
Backup operation failures across all services. Data backup errors, snapshot failures, and disaster recovery issues. Essential for data protection and business continuity monitoring.
Security vulnerability detection events across all services. CVE alerts, security scans, and vulnerability assessments. Critical for security compliance and threat management.
Application resource leak events across all services. Memory leaks, connection leaks, and resource exhaustion patterns. Essential for application stability and resource management.
Kubernetes container crash loop events across all containers. Repeated container failures, startup issues, and application instability. Critical for service reliability and troubleshooting.
Database lock-related events across all services. Deadlocks, lock timeouts, and blocking queries. Essential for database performance optimization and concurrency troubleshooting.
API rate limiting events across all services. Rate limit exceeded, throttling activation, and API quota management. Important for API performance monitoring and capacity planning.
Kubernetes autoscaling events across all services. HPA triggers, pod scaling, and resource adjustments. Essential for capacity management and cost optimization.
SSL certificate events across all services. Certificate expiration, renewal failures, and TLS handshake issues. Critical for security compliance and service availability.
Disk space monitoring events across all hosts. Disk usage alerts, storage capacity warnings, and filesystem issues. Essential for infrastructure monitoring and capacity planning.
Garbage collection events across all services. GC pressure, memory management issues, and JVM performance. Important for application performance tuning and memory optimization.
DNS resolution events across all services. DNS lookup failures, resolution timeouts, and name resolution issues. Critical for network connectivity and service discovery troubleshooting.
Application audit events for all users. User actions, data access, and compliance tracking. Essential for security auditing and regulatory compliance monitoring.
Kubernetes deployment events across all deployments. Deployment rollouts, replica scaling, and deployment strategy execution. Critical for application lifecycle management and deployment monitoring.
Kubernetes StatefulSet events across all StatefulSets. Ordered pod creation, persistent volume management, and stateful application scaling. Essential for database and stateful service monitoring.
Kubernetes DaemonSet events across all DaemonSets. Node-level service deployment, system daemon management, and cluster-wide service monitoring. Critical for infrastructure services and node agents.
Kubernetes Job execution events across all jobs. Batch job completion, task execution, and job failure handling. Essential for batch processing and scheduled task monitoring.

Kubernetes CronJob scheduling events across all CronJobs. Scheduled job execution, cron schedule management, and recurring task monitoring. Critical for automated task scheduling and maintenance jobs.
Kubernetes Ingress controller events across all ingresses. Traffic routing, SSL termination, and external access management. Critical for application exposure and traffic management.
Kubernetes Service events across all services. Service discovery, endpoint management, and load balancing configuration. Essential for microservices communication and service mesh monitoring.
Kubernetes Endpoint events across all services. Backend pod registration, service endpoint updates, and traffic routing changes. Critical for service discovery and load balancing troubleshooting.
Kubernetes NetworkPolicy events across all namespaces. Network isolation, traffic filtering, and security policy enforcement. Essential for network security and microsegmentation monitoring.
Kubernetes PersistentVolumeClaim events across all PVCs. Storage provisioning, volume binding, and capacity management. Critical for persistent storage monitoring and data management.
Kubernetes PersistentVolume events across all PVs. Storage allocation, volume lifecycle, and storage backend integration. Essential for storage infrastructure monitoring and capacity planning.

Kubernetes StorageClass events across all storage classes. Dynamic volume provisioning, storage backend configuration, and performance tier management. Important for storage automation and optimization.
Kubernetes RBAC events across all namespaces. Role binding, permission changes, and access control modifications. Critical for security compliance and access management monitoring.
Kubernetes ServiceAccount events across all service accounts. Identity management, token generation, and pod authentication. Essential for security auditing and identity lifecycle monitoring.
Kubernetes Secret events across all secrets. Secret creation, rotation, and access patterns. Critical for secrets management and security compliance monitoring.

Kubernetes ConfigMap events across all ConfigMaps. Configuration changes, application config updates, and configuration drift detection. Essential for configuration management and application consistency.
Kubernetes Namespace events across all namespaces. Namespace lifecycle, resource quotas, and tenant isolation. Important for multi-tenancy monitoring and resource governance.
Kubernetes Horizontal Pod Autoscaler events across all HPAs. Auto-scaling decisions, metric evaluation, and scaling thresholds. Critical for dynamic resource management and cost optimization.
Kubernetes Vertical Pod Autoscaler events across all VPAs. Resource recommendation updates, vertical scaling decisions, and resource optimization. Essential for right-sizing and performance tuning.

Kubernetes Operator events across all namespaces. Custom resource management, operator reconciliation, and automated operations. Critical for operator-based application management and GitOps monitoring.

Kubernetes Custom Resource Definition events across all CRDs. API extension lifecycle, schema changes, and custom resource management. Essential for platform extensibility and custom controller monitoring.

Kubernetes Admission Controller events across all namespaces. Policy enforcement, validation webhook execution, and security gate enforcement. Critical for security compliance and governance monitoring.
Kubernetes Scheduler events across all pods. Pod scheduling decisions, node affinity evaluation, and resource allocation. Essential for cluster capacity planning and workload distribution monitoring.
Kubernetes Controller events across all namespaces. Control loop execution, resource reconciliation, and state management. Critical for cluster stability and automated operations monitoring.
Kubernetes Kubelet events across all nodes. Node agent operations, container runtime management, and pod lifecycle events. Essential for node health monitoring and container troubleshooting.
Kubernetes API Server events across all namespaces. API request processing, authentication events, and cluster API health. Critical for cluster access monitoring and API performance tracking.
Kubernetes etcd events across all services. Cluster state storage, key-value operations, and consensus protocol events. Critical for cluster data integrity and distributed storage monitoring.

Kubernetes CNI (Container Network Interface) events across all nodes. Network plugin operations, IP allocation, and container networking setup. Essential for network troubleshooting and connectivity monitoring.

Kubernetes CSI (Container Storage Interface) events across all nodes. Storage plugin operations, volume mounting, and storage driver communication. Critical for storage troubleshooting and volume management.
Kubernetes health probe events across all pods. Liveness, readiness, and startup probe execution results. Essential for application health monitoring and traffic routing decisions.
Kubernetes pod termination events across all pods. Graceful shutdown, signal handling, and cleanup operations. Important for application lifecycle monitoring and upgrade procedures.
Kubernetes image pull events across all container images. Image registry access, pull failures, and container startup delays. Critical for deployment monitoring and registry health tracking.
